solution_line_template: He has ${total_one_dollar_bills} in $1 bills because {num_one_dollar_bills} times {value_one_dollar_bill} equals <<{num_one_dollar_bills}*{value_one_dollar_bill}={total_one_dollar_bills}>>{total_one_dollar_bills}.

He has ${total_five_dollar_bills} in $5 bills because {num_five_dollar_bills} times {value_five_dollar_bill} equals <<{value_five_dollar_bill}*{num_five_dollar_bills}={total_five_dollar_bills}>>{total_five_dollar_bills}.
He has ${total_quarters} in quarters because {num_quarters} times {value_quarter} equals <<{num_quarters}*{value_quarter}={total_quarters}>>{total_quarters}
He has ${total_dimes} in dimes because {num_dimes} times {value_dime} equals <<{num_dimes}*{value_dime}={total_dimes}>>{total_dimes}.
He has ${total_nickels} in nickels because {num_nickels} times {value_nickel} equals {total_nickels}.
He has ${total_pennies} in pennies because {num_pennies} times {value_penny} equals {total_pennies}.

He has ${total_money} because {total_one_dollar_bills} plus {total_five_dollar_bills} plus {total_quarters} plus {total_dimes} plus {total_nickels} plus {total_pennies} equals <<{total_one_dollar_bills}+{total_five_dollar_bills}+{total_quarters}+{total_dimes}+{total_nickels}+{total_pennies}={total_money}>>{total_money}.
